title: Elon Musk Says X to Make Algorithm Open Source in Seven Days
description: Social media platform X will open its new algorithm to the public in seven days, Elon Musk said on Saturday, including the code used to decide what posts and advertisements are recommended to users.

title: Nvidia, Tesla Chase Same Self-Driving Goal Via Varying Paths
description: Jensen Huang took the stage at the CES trade show in Las Vegas this week to make the clearest pitch yet for Nvidia Corp.’s autonomous driving technology. In doing so, the chief executive officer’s vision for vehicles that can drive themselves edged into the terrain of major customers like Tesla Inc. and its boss, Elon Musk.

title: Musk Calls UK ‘Fascist’ as Row Over Grok AI Images Escalates
description: Elon Musk accused the UK government of being “fascist” after it stepped up threats to block X over sexualized images of women and children produced by his artificial intelligence tool Grok.
